name: Brutus Goes Back in Time
description:
Marcus Brutus wants to change things, and he knows just how to do it.

Join Marcus Brutus, an inhabitant in a future Rome, set in an alternate universe in which Julius Caesar is the best, most benevolent leader the world has ever seen, Brutus  constructs a time machine to go back and change history.

This is a goofy little game I made with small scope in an attempt to just have something playable and finishable.

This game and all its assets were developed during Mini Jam 51. Thank you for playing! I'm really bad at art.
